  • Constructor Details

    • ChatMessage

      public ChatMessage(String message, String sender, String recipient)
      Constructor
      Parameters:
      message - message describing the event
      sender - nickname of the player that sends the event
      recipient - nickname of the receiver of the message. If null message is sent to all.
